item.title: Photo Roll 11 - Jazzy Fuckin' Holidays 2023 Poster Process
item.description: Part one of a series of progress photo galleries of me working through Our Lady Maven, Issue 2. Drafting, Pencilling, and Inking Starting in on pencils. The lettering and all that was done (as always) on graph paper and glued up as I went; for a more in-depth look at how I do that, check out this process thread. Here's the rest of the lettering, glued up and into place.
